### Select data

```{r}
read_tsv("./../data/02_dat_clean.tsv",
         show_col_types = FALSE) |>
  filter(!str_detect(string = sample_name,
                     pattern = "Denver")) |> 
  arrange(case_control, id, timepoint) |> 
  write_tsv("./../data/03_dat_aug.tsv")
```
